name: Max Limpag
body:
### About me
I'm a journalist, blogger and journalism startup co-founder based in Cebu City, Philippines. I'm the business editor and technology columnist of [Sun.Star Cebu](http://www.sunstar.com.ph/cebu). I'm the co-founder of journalism startup [InnoPub Media](http://innopub.com).

### Contact
I blog at [Leon Kilat: The Tech Experiments](http://max.limpag.com/), you can also drop me an [email](http://mailto:max@limpag.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
